dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 08, 2005 10:51 AM
To: nicole@aestheticsurgeryadvertising.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Abuse
Date: Sun, 5 Jun 2005 21:47:02 -0400
From: <nicole@aestheticsurgeryadvertising.com>
Reply-To: nicole@aestheticsurgeryadvertising.com
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

To Whom It May Concern:

Your company hosts a website that is illegally hotliking images from my
company, which owns www.justbreastimplants.com.  The website www.fusker.com,
which is hosted by ThePlanet.com, is illegally hotlinking 51 images from our
website.  We have not given the owner of Fusker.com, nor any other company,
person, or entity, permission to use our photos and/or steal our bandwidth.

The link is
http://fusker.lewww.com/index.php?lid=503502&query=justbreastimplants
and the link to the photo gallery these images are being hotlinked to is
www.justbreastimplants.com/gallery/set1.htm -
www.justbreastimplants.com/gallery/set51.htm.

Thank you for your time and assistance in this matter.

Nicole S. Boone
Aesthetic Surgery Advertising

- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCpxPJvK/XpJs6oyURAtH2AKCMb09WnCMikBv04+JCRlE3iUvokACfakV1
Nh3Wnm7N/pQ+rQZyyF06+jI=
=MOPc
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
